title: (x) Southbank Centre sans - Lutz Headline, Akkurat {A. Kaye}
content:
[http://www.southbankcentre.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180142/http:/www.southbankcentre.co.uk/ "http://www.southbankcentre.co.uk/")

any ideas of what typeface the logo is set in?

 [‹ E-Photo Zine logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180142/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34250 "Go to previous forum topic") [superbad ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180142/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34247 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marc

comments.content:
Could be Lineto’s Lutz Headline. [http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007180142/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")

EDIT: With modified S

EDIT2: Naah, it isn’t. My bad.
they use akkurat and lutz headline — both from lineto.

The logo isn’t Akkurat or Lutz Headline. Though they use Lutz in the website.

I’d also be interested in finding out about the typeface used in the logo. Akkurat is similar, but the K and R won’t match, and the weight is bolder than Akkurat Bold.
